title: Most active IPs
description: Get list of most active IPs in your API Gateway access log group

introBox.headline: How it works
text: CloudWatch Log Insight snippet that returns top 10 IPs where most requests originated from.
See snippet GitHub repository for the logging setup instructions.

snippets.title: Copy the code into CloudWatch Logs Insights

authors.headline: Presented by Giedrius Praspaliauskas
authors.name: Giedrius Praspaliauskas
authors.bio: Giedrius is a senior solutions architect focusing on serverless at Amazon Web Services.
